verbs.description: [ARG0: More than 70 former US attorneys] [R-ARG0: who] [V: served] [ARG2: under both Republican and Democratic administrations] are calling on Attorney General Jeff Sessions to immediately end the Trump administration 's policy of separating children from their parents who cross the border illegally , saying it is " dangerous , expensive , and inconsistent " with the values of the Justice Department .
